text.section: This section applies only to Howard County.

section.section: The purpose of this section is to authorize the establishment of a quasi-public authority which may be activated by Howard County, if the county decides to designate a quasi-public authority as the core service agency to perform the duties imposed under this subtitle.
This section has no effect on any other form of core service agency, whether it is a unit of Howard County government, a local health department, or a private, nonprofit corporation.
If activated as a quasi-public authority by an ordinance or resolution of the governing body of Howard County, there is established a quasi-public authority in Howard County.

The quasi-public authority shall:
Serve as the core service agency for the jurisdiction; and
Be a public body, corporate and politic.

text.section: The quasi-public authority is exempt from taxation by the State and the county.
Howard County shall send to the Secretary a copy of any ordinance or resolution activating a quasi-public authority which will serve as a core service agency.
